events.message: I recently ordered a laptop from your website, but I want to request a refund because the model I received is not what I ordered.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to receiving the wrong product, categorizing this case under 'Refund'.
Assigning this case to agent Sarah Thompson, who specializes in order refund issues and customer service.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. Let me assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the details of the received item so we can verify and expedite your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I ordered the X200 model laptop, but I received the X100 model instead by mistake.
We have verified the order details. You can return the incorrect laptop using our prepaid shipping label, and we will issue a full refund once received.
Thank you for the prompt response and clear instructions. I appreciate the prepaid label option and will send the laptop back today.
We have received the returned laptop and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to make sure you received the refund and that everything is now resolved to your satisfaction. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting us, and have a great day!
